description:
Fire suddenly finds himself facing the Demon King Mus!  The battle begins as soon as they switch their location to the demon castle.  Meanwhile, the Lamanders are attacking children in Fire’s home town!  Both the human realm and the Oreca realm are affected by Mus’s sheer strength!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Scorching Purgatory! The Power of Demon King Mus!
灼熱煉獄! 魔王ムウスの力!
